titleStmt.title: Abjuration of poperie, by Thomas Abernethie: sometime Iesuite, but now penitent sinner, and an unworthie member of the true reformed Church of God in Scotland, at Edinburgh, in the Gray-frier church, the 24. of August, 1638
titleStmt.author: Abernethie, Thomas, fl. 1638-1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: In King Iames his College, by George Anderson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
